name: Peake Healthcare Innovations
tag_list: medical-imaging, cloud, secure, vendor-neutral-archive, vna, dicom, mint
overview:
Peake offers the first complete, secure, cloud-based medical image management solution and platform.

Peake was formed as a joint venture between two widely recognized market leaders: Harris Healthcare Solutions and Johns Hopkins Medicine. Peake blends the powers of Harris Corporation’s proven track record in the application of Interoperability best practices, secure communications, and managed services for national IT infrastructures with Hopkins’ clinical and research expertise. Our mission is to improve the quality of patient care and the efficiency of the patient care delivery process through transformative innovation in health information management. By building on the strength of open-source software, Peak will cloud-enable the medical imaging practices of hospitals, integrated delivery networks, and health information exchanges with unprecedented performance at the point of care. Our secure, redundant, reliable cloud-based solutions facilitate collaboration within and across enterprise boundaries connecting care providers and patients like never before. This is achieved through our partnership-oriented business model that places emphasis on performance and services. With no up front capital expense and scaled on the performance of your imaging business, our world class services are provided as an essential utility in a pure, operational expense model. We combine our extensive development efforts with the industry’s best applications to empower healthcare providers with choice.
